remarks: All fundamental groups in a path-connected space are isomorphic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
statement:
pconpi1.x $e |- X = U. J $.
pconpi1.p $e |- P = ( J pi1 A ) $.
pconpi1.q $e |- Q = ( J pi1 B ) $.
pconpi1.s $e |- S = ( Base ` P ) $.
pconpi1.t $e |- T = ( Base ` Q ) $.
pconpi1 $p |- ( ( J e. PCon /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> P ~=g Q ) $.
